name: My Little Helper
description:
My Little Helper is a game set in a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction. You use your wit and technical know-how to stealthily venture into dangerous areas to save your Cat who has been captured by enemy forces.
Side quest – you save the world too.

  • Sneak past guards to get to the end of a level.
  • Use a throw able decoy to distract enemy.
  • Collectible items to unlock more of the game.
  • Save your pet and the word too i guess.

Website
